title: All in together
creator_credit: Canaus Films, Film Victoria, Mike Boland and Tarni James
brief_description: A warm and inspiring documentary which explores the attitudes and relationships between disabled and abled children through the liberating experience of a week long campout. Both mentally and physically disabled children discover a sense of self and achievement. Parents of disabled children also present their views.
